name: Polkastarter Shirt
description:
## Polkastarter Shirt

Show your love for gaming with this exclusive Polkastart Shirt. Available from special events.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
